page.title: 07QUEENBOROUGH BROWNIES
page.content: At Brownies in the summer you go away for a week. You might go bell-ringing or visit the farm. Then you go swimming or go to the woods. You might have a disco or a party or go to play in the park. Then you go home. At an ordinary Brownie meeting you might sing some songs like 'Picture a Cowboy' or play a game like 'Traffic Lights' or 'Witches'. You play 'Traffic Lights' like this. If someone says 'Red' you have to sit down. If someone says 'Amber' you have to stand still, and if 'Green' is said you have to run round, and the last one to do it is out. If I go to Brownies I enjoy myself.
